author: reidak49
title: hmmm
review: okay small set and short not vey posible eather the blue and silver go well i like the mask it looks like a girl mask the blades are cool but look a little big and the constuction is fast look at it and you might even put it together and nice for parts

author: Gus_263
title: Ga matoran of Voya Nui
review: I think that set very good for a matoran due to the playability, like the other matoran of Voya Nui and also due to other usable pieces. The mask, from the 2004 water toa (nokama) and two blades be fixed very well on the matoran and also do an cool effect on the matoran. The size is considerable, but the white feet be strange to a blue matoran, and if the blue matoran have a mask with another blue color effect, it be worst. So, i rate Dalu in overall 4/5

author: DarthVader_
title: Awesome matoran!
review: This was my first girl matoran!  She is really cool!  Her hands did break though.  I had to replace them.  Besides that, she is a really cool matoran!  I hope that they make Toa of her and the other matoran!

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO BIONICLE (Matoran) - Dalu Review
review:
This is a fun little set to have and it's fun to play with as well.

Box/Instructions

The instruction has only 2 pages and there're no mistakes in it.

Parts

This figure has some nice parts: We get two daggers, two nice looking feet and another mask which we've seen on Toa Metru Nokama. All pieces are great for future MOC's (My own creations) and/or brickfilms for sure.

The build

The build is very nice and easy and we don't have to complain about stickers as well.

The completed model

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/8726-1.jpg[/img]


The arms, the hands, the legs, the feet and the head can be moved. I think the design of this figure is really cool - even if it doesn't have a lot of play features. As I told you in the beginning: This is a fun little set to have and it's fun to play with as well.

Summary

All in all this set is an great set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
